snippet.title: Hidden Mysteries: Gates of Graceland
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/IHzeHX

The Hidden Mysteries® series is back! Explore the Gates of Graceland® in this Hidden Object Adventure game and find the song Elvis wrote shortly before he died as a tribute to his late mother.

• SEARCH FOR CLUES ABOUT A LAST SONG
The song was never recorded, but is hidden someone in his home. Go through the legendary Graceland to locate the remaining pieces of the song.

• MUSIC PERFORMED BY ELVIS PRESLEY!
The soundtrack comes direct from many of Elvis' top hits and helps transport you in to his world.

• EXPLORE ROCK AND ROLL'S MOST FAMOUS HOME
Each scene is based on rooms from the real Graceland.

• HOME MOVIES AND OTHER VIDEO CLIPS OF ELVIS
Enjoy the home movies and videos clips from Elvis' performances around the world!

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!
